description:
When you hire the Law Offices of Cavanaugh & Cavanaugh, P.A. you are hiring a team of professionals who are committed to excellence. We are loyal to our clients' needs and work tirelessly to provide great client satisfaction. Whether you are facing a divorce, been charged with crime or have been injured in an accident, you can depend on the Law Offices of Cavanaugh & Cavanaugh, P.A. to provide you with the care and personalized attention your case requires and to get you the results you deserve.

We pride ourselves in maintaining great communication with our clients throughout each step of their case, providing one-on-one attention and customized legal strategies for positive results. We understand that the legal system can be overwhelming, which is why we take the time to explain the process very clearly to ensure you are informed and confident with our plan as we move forward as a unified team.

• Alimony (lump sum, permanent, durational, rehabilitative)
